Title: Note from an Unknown Source
Text:
6:00 Morning
Woke up a little earlier than usual. Still thinking about the prophecy Grandmother Lillibet mentioned yesterday, I guess… On the bright side, I won't be late for morning oration!

8:00 Morning
Breakfast was milk, fruit, and herb bread. I'm still not used to eating on a fixed schedule, but the senior Priestesses say discipline makes a proper Priestess.

12:00 Noon
Classes are over. I think I managed to see a little farther today. We all went for lunch together. Bland as ever. Nothing worth writing about.

2:00 Afternoon
The Senate sent someone to speak with Grandmother Lillibet. Something about the prophecy of Septimont and the Hero of Heroes… I didn't catch the rest. Will I be able to have visions like that?

5:00 Dusk
I wish I could go outside and play. Or just go home. But everyone else is so focused… Sister Sophia carved an entire wall today. She's amazing.

7:00 Evening
Went for a little stroll after dinner. Saw a few stars!

11:00 Late Night
Time for bed, though I'm not sleepy at all. Sometimes following the schedule feels like a chore. But today was... not bad, I guess.
